name: Defeat the Wizard
description:
A lone warrior trying to face the mighty wizard. Do you have what it takes to defeat the wizard?

Use the arrow keys to move the warrior and the space button to do melee attack. Warrior deals 1 damage when rage is off and 2 damages when rage is on. Rage is on when warrior health is at 1. Wizard has a simple AI that controls it. Wizard will change to phase 2 when its health is below or equal to 3. Phase 2 makes the wizard attacks and moves faster. 

Check the code at: https://gitlab.com/kikirmd/gamejam
